summary: 2002 LEXUS MALFUNCTIONING BRAKE SYSTEM.  *MR  THE ENGINE SURGED WHILE BRAKING.  IT WAS INDICATED THAT THIS MAY BE DUE TO AN INCREASE IN IDLING SPEED WHEN THE A/C WAS OPERATING.  ON ONE OCCASION THE VEHICLE CONTINUED TO MOVE ALTHOUGH THE CONSUMER APPLIED EXTREME PRESSURE ON THE BRAKE PEDAL.  *SCC   *NLM
